amendment.description: Amendment allocates $10 million in international narcotics control and law enforcement funding toward the counter of methamphetamine efforts in Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to direct attention to the need for increased funding for counter methamphetamine activity in Mexico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Hooley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
